blocks.text: Norway's women hunt Olympic relay gold in Anterselva today

Kirkeeide and Tandrevold anchor Norway's relay charge at 14:45 â€” the last biathlon gold of these Games before the closing ceremony Sunday. After Newcastle's 6-1 demolition of Qarabag in the Champions League today, attention turns fully to the mountains.
